meanings.definition: A person who is an expert in growing roses.
meanings.sent1: The rosarian carefully tended to the rose bushes in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The rosarian shared valuable tips on rose care with the gardening club.
meanings.sent3: The rosarian joked that talking to roses helped them bloom faster.
meanings.sent4: Her love for roses made her a rosarian in every sense of the word.
meanings.sent5: The rosarian's knowledge of roses was as colorful as the blooms themselves.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the cultivation of roses.
meanings.sent1: The rosarian society hosted an event to celebrate all things rose-related.
meanings.sent2: Her rosarian skills were evident in the beautiful rose garden she maintained.
meanings.sent3: The rosarian-themed party was filled with rose-shaped decorations.
meanings.sent4: The rosarian touch in the garden transformed it into a floral paradise.
meanings.sent5: The rosarian fragrance of the rose garden lingered in the air.
